products.title: CIVIC Access Sling 2L
products.body_html:
A compact, streamlined, breathable all-day around-town sling.

CAS2 leverages our intuitive access and exceptional design and infuses it into a small, yet mighty sling. It is patterned to curve with your body, offering an ergonomic fit for everyday use in town or while traveling. Built from our custom-developed and abrasion-resistant 840D Balanced Ballistic Nylon. Drop-in pockets keep your valuables secure and hidden. A dedicated front volume pocket offers quick access to large gear. Newly upgraded sleek strap and buckle system.

Solution Dyed Black is currently out of stock. It will return Winter 2024. Join the waitlist above to hear about its restock first. 

✔️ Backed by a lifetime warranty
✔️ Designed in Bozeman, MT
✔️ Black color textile is Solution Dyed to be more eco-friendly.

featured_image.alt: CIVIC Access Sling 2L in Coyote Brown
CIVIC Access Sling 2L in Solution Dyed Black - Front

products.title: CIVIC Access Pouch 0.5L
products.body_html:
CAP0.5 is sold out and will return by November. Sign up above for restock notifications to be first in line for the return. 

Compact mobile organization in a versatile, protected, & access-forward package.

The latest and smallest addition to our Access Pouch series, CAP0.5 offers our signature 3D patterning and intuitive organization in a new silhouette. Built in a torpedo shape with an end-to-end zipper and 360° of padding, it protects your contents when closed and sits flat when open for quick access as a tray. Flexible and variable internal pockets allow for a multitude of loadouts, from a toiletry kit to pencil case to travel tech pouch to a tool caddy. Sized to fit into a variety of our backpack’s pockets for carry on the go.

✔️ Black color textile is Solution Dyed to be more eco-friendly.  Learn more about the Solution Dying process here
✔️ Lifetime warranty

featured_image.alt: CIVIC Access Pouch 0.5L - Solution Dyed Black - CAP0.5 - Quarter View
CIVIC Access Pouch 0.5L - Coyote Brown - CAP0.5 - Quarter View
CIVIC Access Pouch 0.5L - Burnt Orange - CAP0.5 - Quarter View

products.title: CIVIC Panel Loader 16L
products.body_html:
Our bestselling, award-winning backpack, now in a compact 16L size.

CPL16 takes the streamlined profile, excellent fit, every feature, and the unrivaled access of our #1 bag, CPL24, and applies it to a smaller build. Constructed with our solution dyed custom-built abrasion-resistant textile and our wildly breathable back panel, nothing was sacrificed in this new mobile size. It’s the do-it-all workhorse of an EDC bag you love, created for those who want a slick silhouette or smaller form.

✔️ Ships free worldwide
✔️ Backed by a lifetime warranty
✔️ Designed in Bozeman, MT

Need a larger size? CPL is also available in 24L here.
Find the right size for you via our comparison guide.

CPL16 is out of stock and will return by October 2024. Join the waitlist above to hear about the restock first.

featured_image.alt: CIVIC Panel Loader 16L CPL16 - Solution Dyed Black

products.title: CIVIC Panel Loader 24L - Griffin Edition
products.body_html:
EVERGOODS x Carryology unite to bring you our bestselling backpack in a custom, limited-edition waxed canvas shell.

Akin to the Griffin’s fusion of two legendary animals, we combined our award-winning backpack CPL24 with the historic Scottish mill, Halley Stevensons. We built the bag in four unique colors of P400 Wax C4X, a custom-made high-end cotton & wax finished shell that’s stiff and durable. Then we added beautiful leather "blood knot" zipper pullers sourced from 100-year-old supplier Berger Co. Combined with a stunning hot orange internal lining and the CPL24’s signature features sets and appearance, the Griffin Edition is modern meets heritage incarnate.

Limited edition collab patch included. All sales are final. Lifetime Warranty Applies.

Note: Only 25 of the Waxed Olive and Waxed Blood Orange colors were produced.

Shop the entire Griffin Collection here.

featured_image.alt: CIVIC Panel Loader 24L Waxed Black Carryology
CIVIC Panel Loader 24L Waxed Tan Carryology
CIVIC Panel Loader 24L Waxed Blood Orange Carryology
CIVIC Panel Loader 24L Waxed Olive Carryology

products.title: CIVIC Access Pouch 2L - Undyed
products.body_html:
Our general duty pouch, now Undyed.

The process of dyeing most materials in our industry consumes significant amounts of electricity and water. The Undyed collection skips the entire process and utilizes regular undyed, greige yarn, leading to a more eco-friendly and futuristic-looking end product.

This was a huge effort by our Design team that took trial and effort to source and deliver materials and fabric in an Undyed stage. The final product came out more interesting and nuanced than the black, plus saved energy in the process. Dive into how we built the Undyed Collection here. Dive into how we built the Undyed Collection here.

✔️ Textile, foam, lining, mesh, webbing, zipper chain, and labels are all Undyed
✔️ Experimental and futuristic NASA-feeling
✔️ Every product is one-of-a-kind due to raw material

See the entire Undyed collection here.
Please note, the raw undyed textile may have inconsistent color quality and other defects that would normally be washed out during the dying stage. Read more below for more context.
FREE USA GROUND SHIPPING.

products.title: MOUNTAIN Panel Loader 22L - ECOPAK
products.body_html:
An innovative recycled performance fabric meets our grab-n-go trail bag: MOUNTAIN Panel Loader 22L. 

Inspired by 35 years of creating advanced sailcloth fabrics, ECOPAK was developed by Challenge Outdoor as the world's only durable and waterproof fabric made from 100% recycled polyester film and fiber. Reclaimed plastic bottles turned into a stunning and eco-friendly textile more durable than traditional laminated nylon? Count us in.

We utilized a beautiful variation of ECOPAK, EPX400, as our main material and RBC400 (Recycled Bag Cloth) as our lining (more info on these incredible materials below). Then, we utilized PU-coated YKK Zippers for extra weather resistance.

With our signature design and exceptional fit, we present a unique, eco-friendly version of our versatile town-to-trail pack, built to handle years of rugged use.

✔️ Lifetime Warranty
✔️ Designed in Bozeman, MT

See the entire ECOPAK collection here.

featured_image.alt: MOUNTAIN Panel Loader 22L in Black ECOPAK - Front
MOUNTAIN Panel Loader 22L in Coyote ECOPAK - Front

products.title: ELEMENT Drop In
products.body_html:
An RF-welded and bonded pouch, designed for limitless carry versatility in a waterproof package.

Minimalist yet substantial, utilitarian but still elegant; the ELEMENT Drop In is an essential weatherproof tool in your carry arsenal. Backed by 3+ years of internal R&D efforts, EDI is constructed using radio frequency welding and flat bonding techniques. This is made possible by a custom-developed solution-dyed black textile with a TPU laminate and kiss-coated face. Despite its slim appearance, our signature 3D patterning, mobile dividers, and drop-in slots allow EDI to flex to hold a myriad of everyday and travel loadouts: travel essentials to tech items to even camera kits.

EDI is the first product in our emerging ELEMENT line; a line of EVERGOODS performance equipment comprised of advanced technical construction, innovative manufacturing, and premium textiles.

FREE USA ground shipping.

featured_image.alt: ELEMENT Drop In Waterproof Pouch Front

products.title: MOUNTAIN Panel Loader 22L
products.body_html:
Your grab-n-go trail bag, sized for everyday use across any terrain, be it Yosemite granite or NYC pavement.

We took our bestselling MOUNTAIN backpack, MPL30, and created a lighter, faster, and more versatile smaller sibling: MPL22.  A smaller lid pocket, a full panel stash pocket, and dual side-utility stretch pockets give you quick exterior access to your gear. A panel-loading design makes internal packing easier and offers access to a suspended hydration/laptop sleeve and two gear pockets. Built with our wildly breathable back panel and eco-friendly solution-dyed textile, MPL22 can take a beating over long hot days outside.

Also available in ECOPAK.

✔️ Lifetime Warranty
✔️ Designed in Bozeman, MT
✔️ Ships for free within the U.S.

featured_image.alt: MOUNTAIN Panel Loader 22L in solution dyed black

products.body_html:

Akin to the Griffin’s fusion of two legendary animals, we combined our access-forward duffel, TD35 with the historic Scottish mill, Halley Stevensons. Combined with a stunning hot orange internal lining and the TD35’s signature features sets and appearance, the Griffin Edition is modern meets heritage incarnate.

products.title: Transit Packing Cube 8L
products.body_html:
Travel-forward, compressible, and deceptively versatile, TPC8 is our organization solution designed to zip away your clutter.

Automatic mechanical compression is designed into TPC8’s zipper line, providing a bit of extra storage. Shaped, sized, and patterned for maximum packing options, you can pack it on its side, bottom, or open flat for a myriad of loading solutions. Slim accessory pocket lies on the exterior for stashing passports, laundry bags, or other travel essentials. The outer shell is made from a lightweight, tightly woven, and durable 210d Nylon 6,6.

Designed for use in any travel bag and sized to fit in any EVERGOODS backpack or our Transit Duffel 35L.

featured_image.alt: Transit Packing Cube 8L in Coyote Brown
Transit Packing Cube 8L TPC8 Black
Transit Packing Cube 8L in Hot Orange
Transit Packing Cube 8L Standard Gray

products.title: Transit Duffel 35L
products.body_html:
Meet TD35, engineered to transition between any environment all while providing exceptional access, and protection for your gear.

Utilizing design elements found in our award-winning backpacks, we added structure, amazing carry, access, and ergonomic solutions to the traditional duffel. Tired of floppy bags, loose handles, over-engineered straps, and needing three hands just to see inside and pack? Transit Duffel 35L has you covered AND does it in an eco-friendly, durable package built for a lifetime of adventure. With a 35L capacity, TD35 fits a dynamic lifestyle: carry-on, road trips, gym sessions, business trips, or sabbaticals – it's your grab n' go companion.

✔️ Pairs well with our Transit Packing Cube 8L
✔️ Designed in Bozeman, MT and comes with a lifetime warranty.
✔️ Free U.S. Shipping
Also available in waxed canvas

featured_image.alt: Transit Duffel 35L in Coyote Brown
Transit Duffle 35L - Black

products.title: Mountain Panel Loader 30L
products.body_html:
The all-new MOUNTAIN Panel Loader 30L – upgraded with a wildly breathable back panel and our custom-built, eco-friendly solution dyed textile. It’s the fit, features, access and durability you’ve come to love for daily life with an improved foundation for conquering any mountain terrain.

✔️ Abrasion-Resistant Eco-Friendly Textile
✔️ Wildly Breathable Back Panel
✔️ Dual Water Bottle Pockets + Hydration Sleeve
✔️ Signature Harness Engineered for Active Pursuits
✔️ 3D Pockets for Detailed Gear Organization
✔️ Removable Waist Belt
✔️ Built for Heavy Use in Town and Trail
✔️ Designed in Bozeman, MT.

Customizable with our patches and zipper pulls.

products.title: CIVIC Travel Bag 26L
products.body_html:
A feature-packed bag in a size that transitions beautifully between your daily carry and weekend travel.

The first time we introduced water bottle pockets and a luggage pass-through was with CIVIC Travel Bag 35L, our bestselling one-bag travel solution. Since then, we've heard from you daily about wanting a pared-down version. CIVIC Travel Bag 26L is our solution. Stacked to the brim with signature EVERGOODS 3D pockets, ergonomics, and exceptional fit, CTB26 is a fan-favorite in the making.

✔️ Breathable Back Panel with Luggage Pass-Through
✔️ Stretch Woven Water Bottle Pockets
✔️ Expansive 3D pocket layout
✔️ Solution Dyed Black Textile is Eco-Friendly
✔️ Durable & Water Resistant

FREE GLOBAL SHIPPING AND LIFETIME WARRANTY

products.body_html:
Customize and add increased functionality to your EVERGOODS pack(s) with Hypalon Zipper Pulls. Hypalon provides a thick durable coating that gives a great tactical experience, is easy to grab with or without gloves, and adds extra durability for thousands of accesses to your gear.

Kit includes: 6 Laser-cut TPU Hypalon Zipper Pulls in Black

Zipper Puller Kits are also available in Webbing here.

products.title: EVERGOODS Gift Card
products.body_html:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a EVERGOODS Gift Card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

*Gift cards are only eligible for purchases on evergoods.com.

Quick access, intuitive layout, incredible laptop carry and durable, weather-resistant materials make CHZ22 the go-to everyday backpack for your active lifestyle. We’ve integrated our new abrasion-resistant textile and our breathable back panel into both sizes of the CHZ.

Need a larger size? CHZ is also available in 26L here.
